â•‘  WHAT TO EDIT                                                  â•‘
â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
1. harness: Which AI assistant to use ("claude", "codex", etc.)
- Default: auto-detect based on available tools
- Change if you have a team preference
2. budget: Set spending limits for autonomous sessions
- max_tokens_per_task: Stop if a single task uses too many tokens
- max_tasks_per_session: Stop after completing N tasks
- max_total_cost: Stop if total spend exceeds limit (in dollars)
3. state: Control safety checks before running
- require_clean: Fail if git has uncommitted changes (prevents data loss)
- run_tests: Run tests and fail if they don't pass
- run_typecheck: Run type checker and fail if there are errors
- run_lint: Run linter and fail if there are issues
4. loop: Control the autonomous loop behavior
- max_iterations: Stop after N iterations (prevents infinite loops)
- on_task_failure: "stop" = fail the whole session, "continue" = skip failed task
5. hooks: Optional scripts to run before/after events
- See HOOKS section below for setup
6. interview: Custom questions to ask during task planning
- See INTERVIEW section below for setup

âœ… DO:
- Remove sections you don't use (keeps config clean and readable)
- Set require_clean=true to prevent losing work
- Set run_tests=true to catch regressions
- Use max_tokens_per_task to prevent runaway costs
- Add custom questions relevant to your project type

- Set require_clean=false unless you like losing work
- Turn off tests unless your project has no tests
- Set max_iterations=1 (defeats the purpose of autonomous loops)
- Leave default budget limits disabled (can be expensive)

COMMON CONFIGURATIONS:
- For experiments: Set max_iterations=1, max_tokens_per_task=100000
- For critical work: Set require_clean=true, run_tests=true, run_typecheck=true
- For cost control: Set max_total_cost=50, max_tokens_per_task=200000
- For rapid iteration: Set require_clean=false, run_lint=false
